title: Three leaves for the wind: Rum - Voice of the Constitution of the United States
subtitle: According to maritime law, the crew of the United States Constitution ("Old Ironsides") consumed more than 250,000 gallons of alcohol and not one drop of water during a six-month journey in the late 1700s.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The U.S. constitutional staff ("Old Ironside") consumed more than 250,000 gallons of alcohol and no water at all during a six-month journey in 1798.
